text: Yesli zhenshchina opasayetsya, chto muzh budet proyavlyat' k ney nepriyazn' ili otvorachivat'sya ot neye, to na nikh oboikh ne budet grekha, yesli oni zaklyuchat mezhdu soboy mir, ibo mirnoye resheniye - luchshe. Dusham svoystvenna skupost', no yesli vy budete dobrodetel'ny i bogoboyaznenny, to ved' Allakh vedayet o tom, chto vy sovershayete
